frontmatter.title: Google is the largest computer manufacturer in the world.
frontmatter.short: So you can’t look at that as a thousand machines, but instead look at thousand machines as a single computer.  I look at a data center as a computer.
frontmatter.keywords: business intelligence reporting, data driven decision making, data driven decisions, using data to make decisions
frontmatter.hero_alt: Google is the largest computer manufacturer in the world.
